/* Proportional mockup sizes - iphone 5s: 123.8mm - ipad mini: 200mm - macbook pro: 240mm - imac: 516mm */ @mixin mockup($type) { @if ($type == "tablet angle large featured") { img { max-width: 1000px; @include laptop-and-up { max-width: 800px; } @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 1000px; } } } @if ($type == "tablet angle large") { img { max-width: 1000px; @include mobile { margin-left: -60%; } @include tablet { margin-left: -15%; } @include laptop-and-up { max-width: 800px; } @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 1000px; } } } @if ($type == "tablet portrait large") { img { // tablet max-width: 500px; // mobile @include mobile { max-width: 320px; } // laptop @include laptop-and-up { max-width: 320px; } // desktop @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 500px; } } } @if ($type == "tablet portrait small") { img { max-width: 320px; @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 400px; } } } @if ($type == "tablet portrait triple") { img { max-width: 320px; @include tablet { max-width: 500px; } @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 400px; } } } @if ($type == "tablet side large") { img { max-width: 180px; @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 300px; } } } @if ($type == "mobile portrait") { img { max-width: 320px; @include laptop-and-up { max-width: 240px; } @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 320px; } } } @if ($type == "mobile portrait double") { img { max-width: 320px; @include tablet { max-width: 300px; } @include laptop-and-up { max-width: 240px; } @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 320px; } } } @if ($type == "mobile portrait triple") { img { max-width: 320px; @include tablet { max-width: 240px; } @include laptop-and-up { max-width: 240px; } @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 320px; } } } @if ($type == "mobile side") { img { max-width: 200px; @include below-laptop { max-width: 300px; } @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 240px; } } } @if ($type == "desktop right small") { img { max-width: 400px; @include mobile { max-width: 100%; } @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 600px; } } } @if ($type == "desktop front large") { img { max-width: 600px; @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 800px; } } } @if ($type == "laptop small") { img { max-width: 400px; @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 600px; } } } @if ($type == "laptop large") { img { max-width: 600px; @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 800px; } } } @if ($type == "laptop large featured") { img { max-width: 600px; @include mobile { margin-left: 20%; } @include desktop-and-up { max-width: 800px; } } } }
